content: Near the balcony, you'll find a large plaza where two Spear Daoists guard a building with a green Wisp, while a Snake Herbalist patrols the main path to the left. You'll find he strikes similarly to the Snake Patrollers in Black Wind Mountain, only he can use the poison pot on his back to toss out even more splashes of poison.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Mountain Trail'.
The content is as follows:
Near the balcony, you'll find a large plaza where two Spear Daoists guard a building with a green Wisp, while a Snake Herbalist patrols the main path to the left. You'll find he strikes similarly to the Snake Patrollers in Black Wind Mountain, only he can use the poison pot on his back to toss out even more splashes of poison.
